lead_paragraph: Speaking before the New York State Bankers Association, Adrian M. Massie voiced a well-high universal desire of bankers when he urged that the Treasury outline in general terms some pattern of financing for that part of the deficit which must be financed by the nation's 15,000 commercial banks.
abstract: Ed on commercial banks war financing role
